results.overview: In 1918, a young, disillusioned Adolf Hitler strikes up a friendship with a Jewish art dealer while weighing a life of passion for art vs. talent at politics
results.title: Max

results.overview: Max is 6 years old. She lives with her dad Toni, a small time crook with a golden heart. For Xmas, Max offers him Rose, a call-girl found on the street whom she’s very fond of. Despite the complicated situation, Toni’s gonna have a hard time refusing her daughter’s «gift» and must coexist with Rose.
results.title: Max

results.overview: A dog that helped soldiers in Afghanistan returns to the U.S. and is adopted by his handler's family after suffering a traumatic experience.
results.title: Max

results.overview: Max sells trophies, but is much more interested in dancing than in selling
results.title: Max

results.overview: A recent divorcee finds solace in an evening with a male escort.
results.title: Max

results.overview: Pioneering trans writer Max Wolf Valerio talks about his life and experience of transition in this groundbreaking documentary short, one of the very first portraits of a trans man on film, directed and produced by noted filmmaker Monika Treut.
results.title: Max

results.overview: An eager, low-level magazine writer named Maxine Woodruff and her life at the forefront of the time’s feminist movement.
results.title: Max

results.overview: Released after three years in prison, Max finds out her father, a wealthy businessman, has hired a stranger to play his son. Meanwhile, the ex-husband of the Rent-a-Family director plans to rob Max' father.
results.title: Max

results.overview: The Blakes have a rancher in the burbs, 2 kids, a mid-sized American car, a gas barbecue and lawn furniture. Dad works in an office, Mom does something vague and equally meaningless. They are exactly like all the people you see on the freeway every morning. Something happens - their young son gets sick.
results.title: Max

results.overview: Max's hope is to find a family for him like the rest of his colleagues. When he has almost lost hope his destiny will change, though not the way he expected.
results.title: Max

results.overview: Max is on the run from a quasi-military posse. Outnumbered and caught in a pickle between the posse and the enemy outpost, the odds are not in Max's favour.
results.title: Max

results.overview: On a fishing trip with his parents, young Charlie reels in a black boot from the grimy depth of the sea. Soon after a strange figure lurking in the shadows attempts to lay its hands on something that will tear the family apart.
results.title: Max

results.overview: Maxine is an intern at a car workshop. She works hard toward full-time employment. The reality of the world of work grounds her in her reality: being a woman in a man's world.
results.title: Max

results.overview: Short film, which won the 'MAX IT' short film competition run by the Raindance Film Festival and Pepsi Max in 2010. Tells the life story of an independent production.
results.title: Max

results.overview: Footage of a cat named Max.
results.title: Max

results.overview: A single roll, edited in camera, reveals a small portrait of our ever-present cat. -Marilyn Brakhage
results.title: Max

results.overview: Max and Antoine, two best friends, are having a drink together. Something will interfere with their night: Antoine tries to kiss Max, but Max pushes Antoine back. Max wants to make Antoine understand that he doesn't like men but Antoine thinks the contrary...
results.title: Max

results.overview: Speaking of Neuhaus, he's the subject of the next film, 'Max', which pairs another of his soundscapes against a succession of processed images and heavily edited, percussion-based performance footage.
results.title: Max

results.overview: The story of a young man who has been completely paralyzed for 26 days due to an accident.
results.title: Max

results.overview: Max dreams of more. But what happens if he finds it?
results.title: Max
